alert.note: Alert for Spencer; Warrick (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 26 at 2:43AM EDT until August 26 at 3:15AM EDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: The National Weather Service in Paducah has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Warrick County in southwestern Indiana... Spencer County in southwestern Indiana... * Until 215 AM CDT. * At 143 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Santa Claus to Chandler, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Boonville, Newburgh, Chandler, Rockport, Grandview, Eureka, Chrisney and Tennyson. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
